author: Ben Chapman, Jimmy Vielkind
title: Faces Challenges as U.S. Epicenter...
description: Faces Challenges as U.S. Epicenter... (Top headline, 4th story, link ) Related stories: Biden Slams Trump 'Failure'... Florida Spring Breakers Begin Testing Positive... New York coronavirus cases surge 38% overnight to 20,875... Klobuchar husband hospitalized…
content:
In days, New York City has gone from sounding determined to ride out the coronavirus and keep schools open to confronting daunting challenges as the epicenter of the nations crisis.
